sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; let VotingInstance = require('./Voting') let web3 = require('./Web3'); let project = {} let state = '' let ddl = '' let comments = [] let result = [] class attend_voting_info extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ accounts: '', tickets:0, content:'' } } componentWillMount = async () => { project = {} comments = [] project = await VotingInstance.methods.all_Votings(this.props.match.params.id).call() project.confirmed_ticket = web3.utils.fromWei(project.confirmed_ticket, 'ether') project.target_voting = web3.utils.fromWei(project.target_voting, 'ether'); project.num_voted = web3.utils.fromWei(project.num_voted, 'ether') let proposal_length = project.comment_num for(let i = 1; i <= proposal_length; i++){ let announcement = { content:'', amount:0, isAgreed:false, p_state:'', my_attitude:false, total:0 } result = [] result = await VotingInstance.methods.receiveAnnouncement(this.props.match.params.id, i).call() announcement.content = result[0] announcement.amount = result[1] announcement.amount = web3.utils.fromWei(announcement.amount, 'ether') announcement.isAgreed = result[2] console.log(announcement.isAgreed) if(announcement.isAgreed){ announcement.p_state = "Approved" } else{ announcement.p_state = "Unapproved" } comments.push(announcement) } ddl = project.endtime let current_time = Date.parse(new Date()) if(project.isSuccess === true){ state = "Voting Finished" } else{ if(ddl - current_time >= 0){ state = "Voting in Progress" } else{ state = "Project is overdue" } } ddl = (new Date(parseInt(ddl))).toLocaleDateString() let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts() this.setState({ accounts: accounts }) }; async up(e, value, proposal_id){ let flag if(value === 1){ flag = true await VotingInstance.methods.confirmAnnouncement(this.props.match.params.id, proposal_id.index + 1, flag).send({from:this.state.accounts[0]}) //comments[proposal_id.index].my_attitude = true alert('批准申请成功!') } else{ flag = false await VotingInstance.methods.confirmAnnouncement(this.props.match.params.id, proposal_id.index + 1, flag).send({from:this.state.accounts[0]}) //comments[proposal_id].my_attitude = false alert('否决申请成功!') } } render() { return (
    • 投票系统
     {/**/} {/*
    */} {/*// */}
  • 首页
  • 所有投票
    • {/**/} {/*
    */}
  • 发起投票
    • {/**/} {/*
    */}
  • 我发起的投票
  • 我参与的投票
  • 当前账户地址：{this.state.accounts[0]}

投票项目详情

投票项目发起人：{project.creator_addr}
投票项目名称：{project.title}募集截止日期：{ddl}
投票项目状态：{state}
投票项目目标投票人数：{project.target_voting}eth
投票项目可用资金：{project.num_voted - project.confirmed_ticket}eth
投票项目已使用资金：{project.confirmed_ticket}eth
投票项目投资人数：{project.voter_num}
投票项目概述：

{project.content}

使用情况详情
{ (comments.length===0) ?null :comments.map((item,index)=>{ return (
this.up(e,1, {index}) }> 同意     this.up(e,0, {index}) }> 拒绝
申请金额
{item.amount}eth
{/*
同意百分比
{(item.agreeAmount/item.total).toFixed(4)*100}%
*/}
使用说明
{item.content}
) },this) }
); } } export default attend_voting_info;
